opis: Carbonia 115 - choice for deep water spearfishing. Amazing speed, brutal penetration and accuracy will leave you amazed every time you will pull the trigger.
Carbon-Fiber mono-block speargun from Bleutec. Includes 2x16 BleuTec Speed power bands and BleuTec Diamond spearshaft. Does not include reel.

rezenzije.komentar: Domet je oko 3 metra, preciznost dobra.
